statements: SELECT therapist_id, client_id, message, timestamp FROM therapist_client_messaging WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT message, timestamp, therapist_id, client_id FROM therapist_client_messaging WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM therapist_client_messaging WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT therapist_id, client_id FROM therapist_client_messaging WHERE therapist_id = 3 AND client_id = 4;
SELECT DISTINCT therapist_id, client_id, message FROM therapist_client_messaging ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, client_id, message, timestamp FROM therapist_client_messaging ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT therapist_id, client_id, message FROM therapist_client_messaging WHERE therapist_id = 1 AND client_id = 2;
SELECT therapist_id, client_id, message, timestamp FROM therapist_client_messaging WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(message) AS message_count FROM therapist_client_messaging GROUP BY client_id HAVING message_count > 10 ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, client_id, DATE(timestamp) AS date FROM therapist_client_messaging WHERE therapist_id = 3 AND date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM therapists;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapists ORDER BY therapist_id DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id = 5;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapists WHERE therapist_name LIKE 'Dr%';
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapists JOIN clients ON therapists.therapist_id = clients.therapist_id;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapists;
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapists ORDER BY therapist_name DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapists WHERE therapist_name LIKE 'Dr%' AND therapist_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id = 1 OR therapist_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM therapists;
SELECT name, specialty FROM therapists ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM clients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT clients.name, therapists.specialty FROM clients JOIN therapists ON clients.therapist_id = therapists.id;
SELECT id, name FROM therapists;
SELECT name, specialty FROM therapists WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, age FROM clients WHERE therapist_id = 1 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM therapists;
SELECT * FROM therapist;
SELECT therapist_id, first_name, last_name FROM therapist ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name FROM client WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM message WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, client_id, start_time, end_time FROM session WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM therapist;
SELECT therapist_id, first_name, last_name FROM therapist WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT therapist_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM therapist ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, first_name, last_name FROM therapist WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';

SELECT t.first_name AS therapist_first_name, c.first_name AS client_first_name, s.start_time FROM therapist t JOIN session s ON t.therapist_id = s.therapist_id JOIN client c ON s.client_id = c.client_id;
SELECT * FROM therapist;
SELECT id, name, email FROM therapist WHERE specialization='Mental Health';
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) FROM session GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM client;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM message WHERE is_read=false;
SELECT * FROM therapist WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM therapist WHERE specialization = 'Psychologist';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM message WHERE sender_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM attachment WHERE file_name LIKE '%report%' AND file_path LIKE '%attachments%';

SELECT client.name AS client_name, therapist.name AS therapist_name, session.start_time, session.end_time FROM session JOIN therapist ON session.therapist_id = therapist.id JOIN client ON session.client_id = client.id ORDER BY session.start_time ASC;
